item.description:
Rather than having our regular Tuesday meetup, we said "Let's get our community together for an extended time to kick off 2013 to a strong start, to accelerate & expand their "attractiveness" to easily & effortlessly receive their heart's desires in the New Year."

Join us to create your personal blueprint & get practical suggestions that you can use everyday to W.O.W. your attraction mojo.

- What are the 4 words to X-out?

- What is 1 word to set in motion the attraction factor?

- How do you get your thoughts, feelings & words to align with your intentions? (that even Ghandhi uses)

- How to make sure your Affirmations are not the "faking it" type?

- How to power-up your visualization? (that Abraham says Esther Hicks have fun with)

- How do you turn a sucky day into a good day? (that Jack Canfield uses to become a powerful "magnet" of his dreams)

- What is the MAGIC that is the force as great as The Secret? (that Rhonda Byrne taps into to bring The Secret to millions of people)

and more.....

 

Time: 11 am - 3 pm (with a lunch break)

Bring your Lunch. We'll provide refreshments and snacks.

We're sooo very excited to ring in the New Year with all of you, coming together to CO-create, to bring more happiness, more fulfillment, more love.... in 2013!

 

*******************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

*******************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

It's SUNDAY, so FREE parking. YAY!

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and click "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: How to Accelerate Attraction With Ease in 2013
